title: LOTR: Gollum Hands-on Preview - My First Impressions
description:
I had a chance to play about 30 minutes of The Lord of the Rings: Gollum beta and while I'm excited to play the full completed game, I'm even more excited to explore for deep-cut lore references within.  Here's my first impressions of the game!

Preorder The Lord of the Rings: Gollum here:
https://amzn.to/3oZxcNk
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1265780/The_Lord_of_the_Rings_Gollum/

#gollumgame #lordoftherings #gollum
